mapper.select: select mp.member_project_id, mp.member_id, mp.project_id, pa.authority_id, pa.authority, m.name, m.profile_image from member_project mp left join project_authority pa on mp.authority_id = pa.authority_id left join member m on mp.member_id = m.member_id where mp.member_id = #{memberId} and mp.project_id = #{projectId}
